body:
Day 17 - Manga 378*
It being colored is definitely a plus.
About the story, it wasn't understandable without words and that is a massive minus if you wanna appreciate a story to the fullest.
The art style could be refined for a better reading pleasure.
Overall, a pretty solid read if you open your mind and don't try to understand what is happening.
6/10.
Just good vanilla normality, wish the art was better though 7/10
Another pretty "normal" one? Man i must be on a lucky streak 7/10
